Action.author: seanbohan_sovrin
Action.body: ~ashcherbakov - what is the right key for this object in the object model?

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: The current proposal is to use UUID-based references: https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-node/pull/547

Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: Current master uses new references strategy. We can consider it as done.
